name: DFF NT: The Unlikely Hero Appearance Set & 5th Weapon for Ramza
detailed_description:
Allows Ramza Beoulve to equip the following items.

- Unlikely Hero I (Appearance)
- Unlikely Hero II (Appearance)
- Unlikely Hero III (Appearance)
- Ragnarok (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* You must first purchase the game DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT or download DISSIDA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.

* If you are playing DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition, you must first purchase the Ramza Beoulve Starter Pack before you can use this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2550 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 460 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1280x720 Low settings

  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1920x1080 High settings
